name: Changeling RPG
description:
**Gameplay** Changeling RPG will be a 3rd person singleplayer campaign following an open storyline. You are a changeling with the ability to absorb DNA, which allows you to morph into almost everything. You will be able to interact with Zerg, Terrans, and Protoss, while your current appearance decides, whether you will be treated as friend or foe. The Campaign contains side missions and a main story that will develop depending on your decisions. **Features** \- a huge world with a storyline that depends on your decisions
\- Missions for each race
\- Highly customizable Hero with different abilities and attributes depending on it's current Form
\- Absorbing DNA to alter your own genetic code. **Mechanics preview**

**Older Videos**
